DOC.criteria: Has parent/legal guardian read study consent form agree allow participate study sign consent form Has `` letter assent child '' explain , child agree participate letter sign study investigator child Has provide complete Questionnaire ( Appendix 4A parent complete behalf child school grade 1 2 , 6 7 ; Appendix 4B child complete school grade 11 12 ) Is currently school grade 1 2 , 6 7 11 12 Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule Has give verbal assent participate Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study Has undergone refractive error surgery orthokeratology Has serious medical disorder eye diseases/abnormalities amblyopia cataract cognitive inability conduct test
